name: InfoTrie
desc: InfoTrie's flagship solution FinSentS is a cutting edge Sentiment Analysis and News Analytics engine. It scans the web (news, blogs, social media) and proprietary sources for thousands of stocks, FX, and commodities. Sentiment scores are correlated to asset prices to ensure consistency. They can be used a technical indicator or as a quantitative feed (market data) for your algorithms or systems (risk, compliance, etc).
full_ticker_coverage: SP500, Russell 2000, STOXX600, Commodities, Cryptocurrencies, Forex, Topics (50k + tickers), unquoted companies, executives
full_sector_coverage: Extensive coverage of all sectors. GIC and Bloomberg classification
pricing_structure: Function of client size (AUM), number of users, and redistribution rights
why_us?: 50k+ tickers covered, multi-lingual support. Strong coverage of Europe and Asia.
advantages: 50k+ tickers covered, multi-lingual support. Strong presence in Europe and Asia. Advanced metrics : e.g fear, ESG...
